Package Server

Class MockDBConnection

java.lang.Object
Server.MockDBConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDBConnection
public class MockDBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDBConnection
A replacement of the real database for testing. This class is used by the EventHandler class to execute requests.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MockDBConnection()
    Constructor which initialises the mock database connection.

    • addCompletedOffer

      public void addCompletedOffer​(java.lang.String offerType, int organisationalUnit, int assetId, int assetQuantity, int price)
      Helper Method for testing - inserts a completed offer to the table.
      Parameters:
      offerType - "BUY" or "SELL" offer
      organisationalUnit - the ID of the organisational unit owning the asset
      assetId - the ID of the asset being offered
      assetQuantity - the quantity of the asset in the offer
      price - the price the asset is being offered for

      Inserts a new user to the users table with the provided details.
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface IDBConnection
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new user
      firstName - the user's first name
      lastName - the user's last name
      password - a password for login authentication
      organisationalUnit - the organisational unit ID of the user
      administrator - "Admin" for administrator, "User" for user
      Returns:
      true if the addition was successful, false if not

      Specified by:
      updateOUAssets in interface IDBConnection
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Specified by:
